Package net.sf.borg.ui.popup

Contains the classes that produce and manage the Reminder Popup Windows

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PopupOptionsView.PopupOptionsListener
    interface implemented by the component that is waiting for the resulting popup times string
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApptReminderInstance
    holds an instance of a reminder message.
    PopupOptionsView
    PopupOptionsView displays a dialog that lets the user choose which reminder times to activate or deactivate
    ProjectReminderInstance
    A Reminder Instance class that holds a Project
    ReminderList
    ReminderList is a UI to show the list of reminders managed by the ReminderListManager.
    ReminderListManager
    A Reminder List Manager.
    ReminderManager
    Abstract Base class for managing reminders.
    ReminderPopupManager
    Manages the lifecycle of Reminder Popup windows.
    ReminderSound  
    SubtaskReminderInstance
    A Reminder Instance class that holds a Task
    TaskReminderInstance
    A Reminder Instance class that holds a Task

Package net.sf.borg.ui.popup Description

Contains the classes that produce and manage the Reminder Popup Windows
